title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.4 - Permit to purchase alcoholic beverages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.4 - Permit to purchase alcoholic beverages

State Regulations

An application to purchase alcoholic beverages by a
manufacturer of products which are unfit for beverage use must be accompanied
by a letter or photostat of a letter from the Alcohol Tax Unit of the United

States Treasury Department stating that the products manufactured by the
applicant are classified as exempt from special and commodity taxes. Such
certificate of exemption must be filed only with the first application for a
permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
33.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
